00077 template < typename T > T byteorder(T v)
00078 {
00079   T val;
00080   (reinterpret_cast < unsigned char *>(&val))[3] =
00081     (reinterpret_cast < unsigned char *>(&v))[0];
00082   (reinterpret_cast < unsigned char *>(&val))[2] =
00083     (reinterpret_cast < unsigned char *>(&v))[1];
00084   (reinterpret_cast < unsigned char *>(&val))[1] =
00085     (reinterpret_cast < unsigned char *>(&v))[2];
00086   (reinterpret_cast < unsigned char *>(&val))[0] =
00087     (reinterpret_cast < unsigned char *>(&v))[3];
00088   return val;
00089 }

00091 // reads the ahfstep output files and pushes the values onto vectors
00092 void Storeahf(std::fstream & ahfhalos)
00093 {
00094   unsigned ahf_npart = 0;
00095   unsigned ahf_nvpart = 0;
00096   float ahf_Xc = 0.0f;
00097   float ahf_Yc = 0.0f;
00098   float ahf_Zc = 0.0f;
00099   float ahf_VXc = 0.0f;
00100   float ahf_VYc = 0.0f;
00101   float ahf_VZc = 0.0f;
00102   float ahf_Mvir = 0.0f;
00103   float ahf_Rvir = 0.0f;
00104   float ahf_Vmax = 0.0f;
00105   float ahf_Rmax = 0.0f;
00106   float ahf_sigV = 0.0f;
00107   float ahf_lambda = 0.0f;
00108   float ahf_Jx = 0.0f;
00109   float ahf_Jy = 0.0f;
00110   float ahf_Jz = 0.0f;
00111   float ahf_a = 0.0f;
00112   float ahf_Eax = 0.0f;
00113   float ahf_Eay = 0.0f;
00114   float ahf_Eaz = 0.0f;
00115   float ahf_b = 0.0f;
00116   float ahf_Ebx = 0.0f;
00117   float ahf_Eby = 0.0f;
00118   float ahf_Ebz = 0.0f;
00119   float ahf_c = 0.0f;
00120   float ahf_Ecx = 0.0f;
00121   float ahf_Ecy = 0.0f;
00122   float ahf_Ecz = 0.0f;
00123   float ahf_ovdens = 0.0f;
00124   float ahf_Redge = 0.0f;
00125   int ahf_nbins = 0;
00126   float ahf_Ekin = 0.0f;
00127   float ahf_Epot = 0.0f;
00128   float ahf_mbp_offset = 0.0f;
00129   float ahf_com_offset = 0.0f;
00130   float ahf_r2 = 0.0f;
00131   float ahf_lambdaE = 0.0f;
00132 
00133   ahfhalos >> ahf_npart   >> ahf_nvpart   >> ahf_Xc   >> ahf_Yc   >> ahf_Zc
00134        >> ahf_VXc   >> ahf_VYc   >> ahf_VZc
00135        >> ahf_Mvir >> ahf_Rvir
00136        >> ahf_Vmax   >> ahf_Rmax
00137        >> ahf_sigV
00138        >> ahf_lambda
00139        >> ahf_Jx   >> ahf_Jy   >> ahf_Jz
00140        >> ahf_a   >> ahf_Eax   >> ahf_Eay   >> ahf_Eaz
00141        >> ahf_b   >> ahf_Ebx   >> ahf_Eby   >> ahf_Ebz
00142        >> ahf_c   >> ahf_Ecx   >> ahf_Ecy   >> ahf_Ecz
00143        >> ahf_ovdens
00144        >> ahf_Redge
00145        >> ahf_nbins
00146        >> ahf_Ekin   >> ahf_Epot 
00147        >> ahf_mbp_offset >> ahf_com_offset 
00148        >> ahf_r2 
00149        >> ahf_lambdaE;
00150 
00151   Vahf_xc.push_back(ahf_Xc);  Vahf_xc.push_back(ahf_Yc);  Vahf_xc.push_back(ahf_Zc);
00152   Vahf_npart.push_back(ahf_npart);  Vahf_nvpart.push_back(ahf_nvpart);
00153   Vahf_ovdens.push_back(ahf_ovdens);
00154   Vahf_sigV.push_back(ahf_sigV);
00155   Vahf_J.push_back(ahf_Jx);  Vahf_J.push_back(ahf_Jy);  Vahf_J.push_back(ahf_Jz);
00156   Vahf_EW.push_back(ahf_a);  Vahf_EW.push_back(ahf_b);  Vahf_EW.push_back(ahf_c);
00157   Vahf_EVa.push_back(ahf_Eax);  Vahf_EVa.push_back(ahf_Eay);  Vahf_EVa.push_back(ahf_Eaz);
00158   Vahf_EVb.push_back(ahf_Ebx);  Vahf_EVb.push_back(ahf_Eby);  Vahf_EVb.push_back(ahf_Ebz);
00159   Vahf_EVc.push_back(ahf_Ecx);  Vahf_EVc.push_back(ahf_Ecy);  Vahf_EVc.push_back(ahf_Ecz);
00160   Vahf_Ekin.push_back(ahf_Ekin);  Vahf_Epot.push_back(ahf_Epot);
00161 }
00162 
00163 void
00164 WriteHDF5(std::string filename, double Boxsize, double Redshift,
00165       double HaloTotCount)
00166 {
00167   std::cout << " * Writing HaloProperties into HDF5...";
00168   HDFCreateFile(filename);
00169   HDFCreateGroup(filename, "Header");
00170   HDFWriteGroupAttribute(filename, "Header", "Boxsize", Boxsize);
00171   HDFWriteGroupAttribute(filename, "Header", "Redshift", Redshift);
00172   HDFWriteGroupAttribute(filename, "Header", "NumHalos", HaloTotCount);
00173   HDFWriteDataset(filename, "hp_HaloParticlesCount", Vhp_HaloParticlesCount);
00174   HDFWriteDatasetVector(filename, "hp_PosCM", Vhp_PosCM);
00175   HDFWriteDatasetVector(filename, "hp_PosMB", Vhp_PosMB);
00176   HDFWriteDatasetVector(filename, "hp_VelCM", Vhp_VelCM);
00177   HDFWriteDataset(filename, "hp_Rvir", Vhp_Rvir);
00178   HDFWriteDataset(filename, "hp_Mvir", Vhp_Mvir);
00179   std::string count[4]={"0","1","2","3"};
00180   for(unsigned i=0; i<4; ++i){
00181     HDFWriteDataset(filename, "hp_LambdaPrime_"+count[i], Vhp_LambdaPrime.at(i));
00182     HDFWriteDataset(filename, "hp_Mass_"+count[i], Vhp_Mass.at(i));
00183     HDFWriteDatasetVector(filename, "hp_J_"+count[i], Vhp_J.at(i));
00184     HDFWriteDatasetVector(filename, "hp_EVa_"+count[i], Vhp_EVa.at(i));
00185     HDFWriteDatasetVector(filename, "hp_EVb_"+count[i], Vhp_EVb.at(i));
00186     HDFWriteDatasetVector(filename, "hp_EVc_"+count[i], Vhp_EVc.at(i));
00187     HDFWriteDatasetVector(filename, "hp_EW_"+count[i], Vhp_Eigenvalues.at(i));
00188     HDFWriteDataset(filename, "hp_HaloParticlesTypesCount_"+count[i], Vhp_HaloParticlesTypesCount.at(i));
00189   }
00190   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00191 
00192   std::cout << " * Writing selected ahf results to HDF5...";
00193   HDFWriteDataset(filename, "ahf_npart", Vahf_npart);
00194   HDFWriteDatasetVector(filename, "ahf_xc", Vahf_xc);
00195   HDFWriteDataset(filename, "ahf_nvpart", Vahf_nvpart);
00196   HDFWriteDataset(filename, "ahf_ovdens", Vahf_ovdens);
00197   HDFWriteDataset(filename, "ahf_sigV", Vahf_sigV);
00198   HDFWriteDatasetVector(filename, "ahf_J", Vahf_J);
00199   HDFWriteDatasetVector(filename, "ahf_EW", Vahf_EW);
00200   HDFWriteDatasetVector(filename, "ahf_EVa", Vahf_EVa);
00201   HDFWriteDatasetVector(filename, "ahf_EVb", Vahf_EVb);
00202   HDFWriteDatasetVector(filename, "ahf_EVc", Vahf_EVc);
00203   HDFWriteDataset(filename, "ahf_Ekin", Vahf_Ekin);
00204   HDFWriteDataset(filename, "ahf_Epot", Vahf_Epot);
00205   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00206 }
00207 
00208 /* \brief Return offsets of particle types inside snapshot. */
00209 /* Get the particle ID offsets of the different particle types
00210  * \param ParticleIDOffset, unsigned*: where the offsets are stored
00211  * \param npart, unsigned*: counts of particles types
00212  */
00213 void GetOffsets(unsigned* ParticleIDOffsets, unsigned* npart)
00214 {
00215   std::cout << "offsets: ";
00216   for (int x = 0; x < 6; ++x) {
00217     ParticleIDOffsets[x] = std::accumulate(&npart[0], &npart[x], 0);
00218     std::cout << ParticleIDOffsets[x] << " ";
00219   }
00220   std::cout << std::endl;
00221 }
00222 
00223 /* \brief Analysis of one single snapshot file */
00224 /*
00225  * Analyzes a single snapshot file.
00226  * \param isnap unsigned snapshot ID
00227  * \return void
00228  */
00229 void AnalyzeSnap(unsigned isnap)
00230 {
00231   std::string SnapshotString = Snaps(isnap);
00232 
00233   std::cout << " * Getting particle numbers..." << std::endl;
00234   unsigned TotalNOParticles;
00235   unsigned npart[6];
00236   unsigned id_min[6];
00237   unsigned id_max[6];
00238   double Redshift;
00239   double Boxsize;
00240   double Masses[6];
00241 
00242   std::string SnapshotFilename = Folder("snaps") + Snaps(isnap);
00243   get_particle_number(SnapshotFilename.c_str(), id_min, id_max, Masses,
00244               npart, TotalNOParticles, Redshift, Boxsize);
00245 
00246   std::cout << " * Opening ahf_out_particles...";
00247   std::string SnapshotParticlesFilename =
00248     Folder("output") + Snaps(isnap) + "/ahf_out_particles";
00249   std::ifstream SnapshotParticles;
00250   SnapshotParticles.open(SnapshotParticlesFilename.c_str(),
00251              std::ios_base::in | std::ios_base::binary);
00252   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00253 
00254   std::cout << " * Getting number of halos: ";
00255   unsigned HaloTotCount = 0;
00256   SnapshotParticles >> HaloTotCount;
00257   std::cout << HaloTotCount << " halos totally." << std::endl;
00258 
00259   std::cout << " * Allocating memory...";
00260 
00261   float *ftemp = new float[3 * TotalNOParticles];
00262   int *id = new int[TotalNOParticles];
00263   double *pos = new double[3 * TotalNOParticles];
00264   double *vel = new double[3 * TotalNOParticles];
00265   double *mass = new double[TotalNOParticles];  //, * temp, * u, * rho;
00266 
00267   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00268 
00269   std::cout << " * Reading data blocks..." << std::endl;
00270   FILE *SnapshotFile = 0;
00271   SnapshotFile = fopen(SnapshotFilename.c_str(), "r");
00272   int n = 0;
00273   n = read_gadget_1((int *) id, "ID  ", SnapshotFile);
00274 
00275   n = read_gadget_3(ftemp, "POS ", SnapshotFile);
00276   for (int ii = 0; ii < 3 * n; ++ii)
00277     pos[ii] = ftemp[ii];
00278 
00279   n = read_gadget_3(ftemp, "VEL ", SnapshotFile);
00280   for (int ii = 0; ii < 3 * n; ++ii)
00281     vel[ii] = ftemp[ii];
00282 
00283   n = read_gadget_1(ftemp, "MASS", SnapshotFile);
00284   for (int ii = 0; ii < n; ++ii)
00285     mass[ii] = ftemp[ii];
00286 
00287   delete[] ftemp;
00288   // n = read_gadget_1( ( float * ) temp, "TEMP", SnapshotFile );
00289   // n = read_gadget_1( ( float * ) u,    "U   ", SnapshotFile );
00290   // n = read_gadget_1( ( float * ) rho,  "RHO ", SnapshotFile );
00291   fclose(SnapshotFile);
00292   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl << std::endl;
00293 
00294 
00295   std::cout << " * Getting particle offsets... ";
00296   unsigned ParticleIDOffsets[6];
00297   GetOffsets(&ParticleIDOffsets[0], &npart[0]);
00298 
00299   std::cout << " * Generating particle index map...";
00300   std::cout.flush();
00301   std::map < int, unsigned > DoubleIndexMap;
00302   for (unsigned j = 0; j < TotalNOParticles; ++j)
00303     DoubleIndexMap.insert(std::make_pair(id[j], j));
00304   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00305 
00306   std::cout << " * Writing halo data into HDF5...";
00307   // std::string now = "mkdir " + Folder("output") + SnapshotString;
00308   // RunCommand(now);
00309   std::string now = "";
00310   std::string fn_out = Folder("output") + SnapshotString + "/snapshot_halos.hdf5";
00311   HDFCreateFile(fn_out);
00312   HDFCreateGroup(fn_out, "Header");
00313   HDFCreateGroup(fn_out, "Halos");
00314   HDFWriteGroupAttribute(fn_out, "Header", "Boxsize", Boxsize);
00315   HDFWriteGroupAttribute(fn_out, "Header", "Redshift", Redshift);
00316   HDFWriteGroupAttribute(fn_out, "Header", "NumHalos", HaloTotCount);
00317   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00318 
00319   std::cout << " * Opening ahf_out_halos...";
00320   std::string ahf_halos = Folder("output") + SnapshotString + "/ahf_out_halos";
00321   std::fstream ahfhalos(ahf_halos.c_str(), std::ios::in);
00322   if (!ahfhalos.is_open()) {
00323     std::cerr << " * ahf_out_halos could not be opened!" << std::endl;
00324     return;
00325   }
00326   std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00327 
00328   std::cout << " * Running through cluster: " << std::endl;
00329   unsigned HaloPopulation = 0;
00330   unsigned HaloNumber = 0;
00331   double HaloMass = 0.0;
00332 
00333   // Loop over all halos: get particles, build HP, determine properties
00334   for (unsigned ihalo = 0; ihalo < HaloTotCount; ++ihalo) {
00335     SnapshotParticles >> HaloNumber;
00336     std::cout << "Halo " << HaloNumber << std::endl;
00337     SnapshotParticles >> HaloPopulation;
00338     std::cout << "Halo Population = " << HaloPopulation << std::endl;
00339     SnapshotParticles >> HaloMass;
00340     std::cout << "Halo Mass = " << HaloMass << std::endl;
00341     std::cout << " * * Getting index positions of particles in the cluster..."
00342           << std::flush;
00343 
00344     int *ParticleIndexID = new int[HaloPopulation];
00345     int *ParticleIndexType = new int[HaloPopulation];
00346     double *ParticleIndexMass = new double[HaloPopulation];
00347 
00348     int ParticleID = 0;
00349     int ParticleType = 0;
00350     double ParticleMass = -1.0;
00351     for (unsigned i = 0; i < HaloPopulation; ++i) {
00352       SnapshotParticles >> ParticleID;
00353       //std::cout << "ParticleID = " << ParticleID << std::endl;
00354       SnapshotParticles >> ParticleType;
00355       //std::cout << "ParticleType = " << ParticleType << std::endl;
00356       SnapshotParticles >> ParticleMass;
00357       //std::cout << "ParticleMass = " << ParticleMass << std::endl;
00358       ParticleIndexID[i] = ParticleID;
00359       ParticleIndexType[i] = ParticleType;
00360       ParticleIndexMass[i] = ParticleMass;
00361     }
00362     std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00363 
00364     std::cout << " * * Calculating properties of halo " << ihalo <<
00365       std::endl;
00366     char buffer[10];
00367     sprintf(buffer, "%d", ihalo);
00368     std::string datas = buffer;
00369     std::string datasp = "Cluster_Pos_" + datas;
00370     std::string datasv = "Cluster_Vel_" + datas;
00371     std::string datasm = "Cluster_Mass_" + datas;
00372 
00373     std::cout << " * * Allocating space for halo..." << std::flush;
00374     double *pos2 = new double[3 * HaloPopulation];
00375     double *vel2 = new double[3 * HaloPopulation];
00376     double *mass2 = new double[HaloPopulation];
00377     std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00378     std::cout << " * * Sorting pos, vel and mass according to particle type..." << std::endl;
00379     unsigned particleCounter[5] = { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
00380     unsigned HaloParticleIDOffsets[5] = { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
00381     unsigned HPIDO[5] = { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
00382     std::cout << " * * First step: determine particle ID offsets for this specific halo...";
00383     for (unsigned k = 0; k < HaloPopulation; ++k)
00384       HPIDO[ParticleIndexType[k]]++;
00385     for (int x = 0; x < 5; ++x)
00386       HaloParticleIDOffsets[x] = std::accumulate(&HPIDO[0], &HPIDO[x], 0);
00387     std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00388 
00389     Vhp_HaloParticlesCount.push_back(HaloPopulation);
00390 
00391     for (unsigned k = 0; k < HaloPopulation; ++k) {
00392       // running through all particles inside this halo
00393 
00394       // putting entry in new list at right position:
00395       // we know the particle offset (inside halo) and the number of particles accounted so far
00396       unsigned ptype = ParticleIndexType[k];
00397       mass2[HaloParticleIDOffsets[ptype] + particleCounter[ptype]] = mass[DoubleIndexMap[ParticleIndexID[k]]];
00398       for (unsigned i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00399     pos2[3 * (HaloParticleIDOffsets[ptype] + particleCounter[ptype]) + i] = pos[3*DoubleIndexMap[ParticleIndexID[k]]+i];
00400     vel2[3 * (HaloParticleIDOffsets[ptype] + particleCounter[ptype]) + i] = vel[3*DoubleIndexMap[ParticleIndexID[k]]+i];
00401       }
00402       ++particleCounter[ptype];
00403     }
00404     std::cout << "   ...done!" << std::endl;
00405 
00406     std::cout << " * * Generating starting and size vectors...";
00407     unsigned istart[4] = { HaloParticleIDOffsets[0],
00408                HaloParticleIDOffsets[0],
00409                HaloParticleIDOffsets[1],
00410                HaloParticleIDOffsets[4]};
00411     unsigned isize[4] = { HaloPopulation,
00412               HPIDO[0],
00413               HPIDO[1]+HPIDO[2]+HPIDO[3],
00414               HPIDO[4]};
00415     for(unsigned ppp = 0; ppp < 4; ++ppp)
00416       Vhp_HaloParticlesTypesCount.at(ppp).push_back(HPIDO[ppp]);
00417     std::cout << "done!";
00418 
00419     // cosmology
00420     double Omega_M = 0.3;
00421     double h = 0.7;
00422     //double rhobox = 1.8791E-29 * Omega_M; // in gm/cm^3
00423     double rhobox = 2.7757819e-8 * Omega_M / (h * h);   //in 10^10 msun/(h kpc)^3
00424     rhobox = 0.0;   // gives loops over all particles, independent of overdensity
00425     double Rvir = -1.0;
00426     double Mvir = -1.0;
00427     double Mtot = -1.0;
00428     Vector3 xcm;
00429     Vector3 vcm;
00430     Vector3 xmb;
00431 
00432     for (unsigned ppp = 0; ppp < 4; ++ppp) {
00433       std::cout << " * * Creating halo...";
00434       HaloProperties halo = HaloProperties(&pos2[istart[ppp]], &vel2[istart[ppp]], &mass2[istart[ppp]], isize[ppp], Redshift);
00435       std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00436 #if 0 // exclude unbound particles in this step?
00437       std::vector < bool > exc(HaloPopulation);
00438       std::vector < bool > excs(HaloPopulation);
00439       std::cout << " * * Cleaning unbound particles..." << std::endl;
00440       halo.CleanUnboundExc(Boxsize, exc);
00441       halo.CleanUnboundSimple(Boxsize, excs);
00442       std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00443 
00444       std::cout << " * * Pushing back exclusion vectors...";
00445       std::vector < int > exci(HaloPopulation);
00446       for (unsigned i = 0; i < HaloPopulation; ++i)
00447     exci.at(i) = int (exc.at(i));
00448       HDFWriteDataset(fn_out, datasx, exci);
00449       for (unsigned i = 0; i < HaloPopulation; ++i)
00450     exci.at(i) = int (excs.at(i));
00451       HDFWriteDataset(fn_out, datasxs, exci);
00452       std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00453 
00454       std::cout.flush();
00455 #else
00456       //change all following calculations such that they have an exclusion list available
00457 #endif
00458       std::cout << " * * Computing total mass...";
00459 
00460       Mtot = halo.ComputeTotalMass();
00461       std::cout << Mtot << ", done." << std::endl;
00462       if (ppp == 0) {
00463     std::cout << " * * Computing center of mass...";
00464 
00465     halo.ComputeCM(Boxsize, xcm);
00466     std::cout << xcm << ", done." << std::endl;
00467 
00468     std::cout << " * * Computing center velocity...";
00469     halo.ComputeCenterVel(vcm);
00470     std::cout << vcm << ", done." << std::endl;
00471 
00472     std::cout << " * * Computing position of most bound particle..." << std::flush;
00473     halo.ComputeMB(Boxsize, xmb);
00474     std::cout << xmb << ", done." << std::endl;
00475 
00476     std::cout << " * * Centering on most bound particle...";
00477     halo.CenterOnMB(Boxsize);
00478     halo.CenterVel();
00479     std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00480 
00481     std::cout << " * * Computing virial properties...";
00482     halo.ComputeVirialProperties(rhobox, Mvir, Rvir);
00483     std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00484 
00485     for (unsigned j = 0; j < 3; Vhp_PosCM.push_back(xcm(j)), ++j);
00486     for (unsigned j = 0; j < 3; Vhp_VelCM.push_back(vcm(j)), ++j);
00487     for (unsigned j = 0; j < 3; Vhp_PosMB.push_back(xmb(j)), ++j);
00488     Vhp_Mvir.push_back(Mvir);
00489     Vhp_Rvir.push_back(Rvir);
00490       }
00491 
00492       std::cout << " * * Computing angular momentum..." << std::flush;
00493       Vector3 J;
00494       halo.ComputeAngularMomentum(J);
00495       std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00496 
00497       std::cout << " * * Computing lambda'..." << std::flush;
00498       double lambda = 0.0;
00499       halo.ComputeLambdaPrime(lambda, Mvir, Rvir);
00500       std::cout << lambda << ", done." << std::endl;
00501 
00502       std::cout << " * * Computing Axes..." << std::flush;
00503       Vector3 Eigenvalues;
00504       std::vector<Vector3> Eigenvectors;
00505       halo.ComputeMajorAxes( Eigenvalues, Eigenvectors );
00506       std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00507 
00508       std::cout << " * * Pushing back HaloProperties outputs...";
00509       for (unsigned j = 0; j<3; ++j) {
00510     Vhp_J.at(ppp).push_back(J(j));
00511     Vhp_EVa.at(ppp).push_back((Eigenvectors.at(0))(j));
00512     Vhp_EVb.at(ppp).push_back((Eigenvectors.at(1))(j));
00513     Vhp_EVc.at(ppp).push_back((Eigenvectors.at(2))(j));
00514     Vhp_Eigenvalues.at(ppp).push_back((Eigenvalues)(j));
00515       }
00516       Vhp_LambdaPrime.at(ppp).push_back(lambda);
00517       Vhp_Mass.at(ppp).push_back(Mtot);
00518       std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00519     }
00520     // step through all of the different particles.
00521 
00522     std::cout << " * * Deleting arrays from ahf output...";
00523     delete[] ParticleIndexID;
00524     delete[] ParticleIndexType;
00525     delete[] ParticleIndexMass;
00526     std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00527 
00528     std::cout << " * * Deleting arrays from halo2...";
00529     delete[] pos2;
00530     delete[] vel2;
00531     delete[] mass2;
00532     std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00533 
00534   }
00535   //next halo
00536   delete[] id;
00537   delete[] pos;
00538   delete[] vel;
00539   delete[] mass;
00540 
00541   std::cout << " * * Pushing back ahf outputs...";
00542   Storeahf(ahfhalos);
00543   ahfhalos.close();
00544   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00545 
00546   SnapshotParticles.close();
00547   fn_out = Folder("output") + SnapshotString + "/extra.hdf5";
00548   WriteHDF5(fn_out, Boxsize, Redshift, HaloTotCount);
00549 
00550   std::cout << " * Properties extracted." << std::endl << std::endl;
00551   return;
00552 }
